title: Friends sending free skin scams?
body: So basically recently my friends have been sending messages that say free skin for you then insert scam link here and it’s becoming quite annoying. Please do something about this. I don’t think they were sent by the actual friend.

replies.body: That friend of your handed out his info for free skin/RP scam on the net. Now his account is breached.

Yeah im pretty sure some of your friends entered their log in details to a scam site and their accounts have been compromised. Best get your friends to reset their passwords and their emails associated to the accounts. 

If for any reason they can't, be sure to send in a ticket to [Riot support ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Ask your actual friend. then tell your friend to change their password.
